name: Pirates in Love: Captain's Cut
storyline:
By accident you ended up on a pirate ship, and are given the choice to shack up with the handsome pirate you desire. You join the pirates and travel the high seas, all while discovering love. Each pirate has his own enthralling, unique storyline.

You’ll join the pirates on quests and treasure hunts, and get to join them for parties at night. However, the pirate’s life is still a dangerous one, but you can count on your beloved pirate to rescue you from harm. You and your dream pirate will grow closer through all these heroic acts, but remember, the fun is all in the journey.
summary:
A re-localized English version of the app using the original Japanese character names and unmodified artwork. The original localization was retired in 2018, and Captain's Cut was transferred into Voltage's Love 365 library app.

Set sail on a voyage of destiny! A twist of fate puts you aboard a pirate ship that’s off on the treasure-hunting adventure of a lifetime.

Where will your journey lead you? To untold riches or the sweet love of a swarthy pirate…?
